name: Life Of Deer
description:
An animal adventure game that follows the growth and adventure of a baby deer in a beautiful wild.

[Story]
A baby deer was born to a father deer, the chief of deer herd and the most beautiful mother deer in the world. He spends peaceful and happy days by playing with animal friends in the beautiful nature of wild. But the happiness didn’t last long. When the baby deer was in danger to lose his life from the predators of wild, he barely managed to survive thanks to the help of father deer…


[Features]
▶ A real game that unfolds in a beautiful background that presents the scenery of wild as it is
▷ An adventure game in which you complete various missions by following the eyes of baby deer
▶ A fairy tale-like story game showing the young deer’s growth, pain, and love toward his family
▷ A healing game that soothes one’s mind through a soft and calm story and the beautiful background of nature in the game


If you want more information, please visit our game pages!!!
